## BasicExtrudedLineTechnique interface

Runtime representation of \[\[BasicExtrudedLineStyle\]\] as parsed by \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\]. For technique parameters see \[\[BasicExtrudedLineTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BasicExtrudedLineTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<BasicExtrudedLineTechniqueParams> 
```
